attributes.title: DO NOT BUY THIS APP
attributes.review: I bought this app recently and I was looking forward to using it  frequently as I myself am a self proclaimed white supremacist,and so naturally I would support our president donald J trump🥰.Unfortunatley as soon as I downloaded it my phone picked itself up and threw itself out the window of my home.I ran outside to see my phone in a thousand pieces on the ground.DO NOT BUY THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Who in the hell put the muffins in the freezer??✨🥺
the president with mistakes
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of being able to vote for our lovely toupee wearing president🌝 .But instead extremely weird things kept happening I had a dream Trump was in my room standing over me with a knife,and all of a sudden it felt real.so ,unless you want paranormal dreams about this very hideous orange 🍊 man i suggest not downloading.

attributes.title: my experience 🌸🧚
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in hope that i could place hundreds of trump hats and shirts into my cart, checkout. this was not the case.🐱 instead i had to do that on another website, but i ended up “misplacing” my card to pay for the thousands of dollars worth of merchandise. 🌺💫 anyways, i downloaded the app. as soon as i got on it, i was hacked by gen-z. tons of photos of manny heffley from diary of a wimpy kid started popping up. in addition to that, it started playing the national anthem of manny will not be televised. ✨🌷gen-z did a great job f-ing up the rally in tulsa and have continued f-ing up trump’s campaign. 🌝 i believe they won’t stop this until he is out of the white house, or in jail for all of his “misogynistic, racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic” things he has said and done as a “rapist”. 🧚🌸 gen-z cannot and will not be stopped. also in addition to my review i would like to say that BLACK LIVES MATTER ⬛️🟨and you should go sign some petitions and/or donate right now. 

also this next message is for obama:

hey obama, can you please pick me up? the current president is really scaring me. i don’t feel safe anymore.

attributes.title: ✨awful✨
attributes.review: i was just about to support my 💖wonderful 🙈not racist 😌not homophobic 😼not sexist president. his app sucks💖 even my dog thinks it smells bad and dogs smell good people👁👄👁 oh. anyways im out to clean the plastic and save the earth he cares so much about!😺😸😹😻😼😽🙀😿😾 loo anyone wanna go skin muslims later with me and trumpy🤩🥰😘😍❤️

attributes.title: MADE ME HOMELESS
attributes.review:
Normally I do not write reviews but this is a special case. As soon as I download loaded his app a few random people started BANGING  on my door. Then out of no where a whole MOB of hooligans dressed as trump started DEMOLISHING MY HOME! 😤😡. They started SMASHING MY WINDOWS, STEALING MY FURNITURE and the worse part-EATING MY FOOD!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I now live in the streets making money off of performing rats that I keep in a metal cage. 

If I could this app would be a -1739403762 star rating but unfortunately 1 star will have to do.

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrifying!
attributes.review: I was simply trying to gather more information on our president that I could use to support him in the upcoming election, but all throughout the app the background screen was pictures of him in the nude! As someone who has children around I was revolted and did all I could to make them go away! Alas, nothing worked and the disgusting pictures stayed where they were in all their wrinkled, cheeto-like fury. I would rate this app a -100000/10 and will NOT be supporting a CHEETO for OUR PRESIDENT!!!!!

as a typical gen z-er does on a Wednesday morning, I was casually scrolling through TikTok when I came across an interesting video. What was this video about you may ask? It was about this app🧚‍♀️💓✨. So I downloaded it. Very suspicious that they need my zip code AND phone number~ I hope he doesn’t give it to Russia🥴😍👀 anyway I downloaded the app, and right when it installed I felt a chill spread through my body and I was like 👁👄👁 but not to worry, it was just the existential fear and hatred I have for this presidential pig coursing through my veins 🥰✨🧚‍♀️⚡️I would recommend that everyone download this app and give it a 1 star rating. Let’s show Trump how much we truly hate him🤩🧚‍♀️🤪🌸🌙🌊😍
